mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OTREEUSER_WORKSPACE(userId, workspaceId, roleId) VALUES(#{userId}, #{workspaceId},#{roleId})
mapper.select: SELECT owo.userid, owo.name, owo.email, owo.profilesrc, owo.workspaceid, owo.roleid, r.rolename FROM (SELECT o.userid userid , o.name name, o.email email, o.profilesrc profilesrc, ow.workspaceid workspaceid, ow.roleid roleid FROM OTREEUSER_WORKSPACE ow JOIN OTREEUSER o ON ow.userId = o.userId WHERE ow.workspaceId = #{workspaceId}) owo JOIN ROLE r ON owo.roleid = r.roleid
